metadata.Plot: The lives of two Australian women, Lorna Whyte, an army nurse, and Sister Berenice Twohill, a Catholic nun, from New South Wales during World War II.
metadata.Actors: Claire van der Boom, Sarah Snook, Khan Chittenden
